name: The Coral Maze
description:
This is The Coral Maze!

An exciting arcade puzzle adventure. Guide the fish around each maze by manipulating the maze itself.
Collect the starfish and as much treasure as you can and finish the level as quickly as possible to achieve the highest scores.
•Collect power ups
•Battle crabs
•Find you way though the kelp forest.
•Much more
Hours of fun ! play for hours or 5 minutes. Great for the bus, the train the doctors waiting room. Or just chilling out at home.

Game Centre Support
Earn achievements and compete with your friends to get the highest times on the Game Centre leaderboards.
Also Because we love you guys . we’ll continue to provide updates and new levels on a regular basis!

Follow us on twitter @TheCoralMaze to receive all the latest Coral Maze News and to send us any feedback you have about the game.
